actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure. Relations, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment

official_title: To require the Corps of Engineers to carry out the construction and operation of a jetty and sand transfer system, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Oregon Inlet Protection Act of 1995 - Directs the Secretary of the Army to construct, operate, and maintain the jetty and sand transfer system for the Oregon Inlet on the coast of North Carolina, subject to specified requirements, limitations, and modifications. Exempts such action from any permit requirement prior to the use of such system.

titles.title: To require the Corps of Engineers to carry out the construction and operation of a jetty and sand transfer system, and for other purposes.
